headline: NRG Energy shares surge 10% as Q4 profit tops estimates; guide reaffirmed
summary: Investing.com -- NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) saw its shares jump more than 10% following the market open Wednesday after the US energy company reported better Q4 profit than what analysts expected.
